content:
I am trying to build the following dockerfile for the https://github.com/tqdm/tqdm.git repository. It should install any necessary dependencies and then run tests to confirm that installation succeeded:
# Use the official conda base image
FROM continuumio/miniconda3

# Set the working directory
WORKDIR /app

# Copy the entire repository into the container
COPY . /app/

# Create the conda environment using environment.yml
RUN conda env create -f environment.yml

# Activate the environment and install any additional dependencies with pip
RUN conda run -n tqdm pip install .

# Run the test suite to verify that everything works
RUN conda run -n tqdm pytest
